# Table of redistribution dates
```{r redist_dates}
library(rvest)
url <- "http://www.aec.gov.au/Electorates/Redistributions/dates.htm"
table <- read_html(url) %>%
  html_nodes("th~ td , tr+ td , table+ table th") %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)


dist_table_html <- html_nodes(webpage, "th~ td , tr+ td , table+ table th")
dist_table <- html_table(dist_table_html, fill = TRUE, header = FALSE)

```
